document_notes.text:
This update for mercurial fixes the following issues: 

Security issues fixed:
- CVE-2016-3105: Versionsprior to 3.8 allowed arbitrary code execution
  when using the convert extension on Git repo. (bsc#978391)

notes.text: The convert extension in Mercurial before 3.8 might allow context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted git repository name.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
